body:
Comment 2: 
I think this is working as intended.
Go makes many requirements on the way
you have to write packages to make them
work with gotest.  One is that you can't use
_test.go anymore.  Another is that you have
to name the file Makefile.  Eventually we'll get
rid of the Makefile but for now I don't see why
we should bother with the complexity of looking
in multiple places.

Russ
